verses.name: Numbers 7:75
verses.text: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:76
verses.text: One kid of the goats for a sin offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:77
verses.text: And for a sacrifice of peace offerings, two oxen, five rams, five he goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the offering of Pagiel the son of Ocran.

verses.name: Numbers 7:78
verses.text: On the twelfth day Ahira the son of Enan, prince of the children of Naphtali, offered:
